text:
Champions League
Valence - Lille streaming: where to see the match?
Valencia receives Lille at the Estadio de Mestalla, as part of the fourth day of the Champions League. A meeting broadcast live on French television on the RMC Sport 2 channel, this Tuesday, November 05, from 21 hours, but also to follow live streaming on Android, iPhone, Ipad, PC or Mac
05 Nov 2019, 06:45 by Charlie Creteur



Renato SanchesClub previous: Bayern MunichCompensation: 20 millionIcon Sport



Tiago DjaloClub previous: Milan ACIndemnity: NCIcon Sport



Yusuf YaciziClub previous: TrabzonsporIndemnity: 16.5 millionIcon Sport



Domagoj BradaricClub previous: Hajduk SplitIndemnity: 6.5 millionIcon Sport



Victor Osimhen Previous club: Sporting CharleroiIndemnity: 12 millionIcon Sport



ReinildoClub previous: BelenensesCompensation: 3 millionIcon Sport



Tomothy WeahClub previous: PSGIndemnity: 10 millionIcon Sport



Previous Leonardo Club: Rio AveCompensation: 6 millionIcon Sport



Benjamin Andr√©Club previous: Stade RennaisIndemnity: 8 millionIcon Sport



Virgiliu PostolachiClub previous: PSGIndemnity: freeIcon Sport

Lille: all the rookies of the 2019 transfer window




After facing Olympique Marseille at the 12th day of the League Velodrome, Lille will play their future in the European Cup tonight against Valencia. Indeed, the Dogues are still in the last place of the group H at 3 points of the 3rd, Valencia. A defeat could put a damper on the Nordists, in this race to the eighth finals of the Champions League but also for the Europa League. The players of Christophe Galtier will be keen to rely on their reaction late in the first match against the Spanish club (1-1).







The classification of group H:




Daniel Parejo + 10 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport


Chelsea - 6 pts (+1)
Ajax - 6 pts (+5)
Valencia - 4 pts
Lille - 1 pt




The schedule of group H:




Mike Maignan + 10 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1st day - September 17th

Ajax Amsterdam 3-0 Lille
Chelsea 0-1 Valencia

2nd day - October 2nd

Lille 1-2 Chelsea
Valencia 0-3 Ajax Amsterdam

3rd day - 23rd of October

Ajax Amsterdam 0-1 Chelsea
Lille 1-1 Valencia

4th day - November 5th

9 pm: Valence - Lille
9 pm: Chelsea - Ajax Amsterdam

5th day - 27th November

18h55: Valencia - Chelsea
9 pm: Lille - Ajax Amsterdam

6th day - December 10th

9 pm: Chelsea - Lille
9 pm: Ajax Amsterdam - Valencia

Valence - Lille streaming




Albert Celades + 10 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This meeting between Lille and Valencia is broadcast on Tuesday, November 5 on RMC Sport 2 from 21:00 French time. A channel accessible by subscription to a limited number of audiovisual actors. Mainly SFR and Canal +. As a result, you can not access it via your Internet operator for example, there is an alternative solution: the 100% digital offer of RMC Sport (or OTT). A subscription available at a price of 9 euros per month for mobile or fixed subscribers of SFR, 19 euros per month with commitment / 25 euros per month without commitment for non-subscribers.
